## Introduction

This dashboard demonstrates that a dashboard layout similar to the [*Bootstrap dashboard template*](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.3/examples/dashboard/) can be implemented in [Panel](https://panel.pyviz.org/).

## App

This app runs entirely in the browser via [Pyodide](https://pyodide.org) and [panel convert](https://panel.holoviz.org/how_to/wasm/convert.html).
